items.label: assump-os1-isotropic-potential
items.title: Isotropic Potential Landscape
items.content:
759: :label: assump-os1-isotropic-potential
760: 
761: The fitness potential $\Phi: \mathbb{R}^4 \to \mathbb{R}$ is **rotationally invariant**:
762: 
763: $$
764: \Phi(Rx) = \Phi(x)
765: $$
766: 
767: for all rotations $R \in \text{SO}(4)$ and $x \in \mathbb{R}^4$.
items.raw_directive:
756: ### Isotropic Fitness Potential
757: 
758: :::{prf:assumption} Isotropic Potential Landscape
759: :label: assump-os1-isotropic-potential
760: 
761: The fitness potential $\Phi: \mathbb{R}^4 \to \mathbb{R}$ is **rotationally invariant**:
762: 
763: $$
764: \Phi(Rx) = \Phi(x)
765: $$
766: 
767: for all rotations $R \in \text{SO}(4)$ and $x \in \mathbb{R}^4$.
768:
